get.description: get full status for user/admin controllers
Get data for an unowned controller. Controller must be in pairing mode.

put.description: Update Controller. In case serial number is entered, a new controller Id is returned.

get.description: get full status for user/admin controllers
Get current alarms status for user/admin controllers

post.description: Request controller to to identify itself (light or sound)
Set configurations for controller

get.description: Get current configurations of controller
get history for all master flush activations. no offset/limit. If response too large - will fail.
get alarms history for all controllers
get alarms history for all controllers
Get Backend and API versions

post.description: Set ownership of a controller to a user. Controller must be in pairing mode (authorized by users only)

get.description: Get data for an unowned controller. Controller must be in pairing mode.

post.description: Upload image for controller to be registered

put.description: Update Controller. In case serial number is entered, a new controller Id is returned.

delete.description: Delete shared/owned controller from a user's hold. if owned by user, all shares will be revoked  (authorized by users only)

get.description: get full status+info of a specific controller
get full status for user/admin controllers
Get controller info.
Get info for user/admin controllers
Get current alarms status.
Get current alarms status for user/admin controllers

post.description: Share a controller with another user. If user not exist do nothing, return ok. (authorized by users only)

delete.description: Delete controller share with another user (by owner only)

get.description: Get all sharing status
Get all sharing status

post.description: Approve share invite for a specific controller

get.description: Get list of all users sharing a specific controller (authorized by users only)

200.description: all the shared users on the controller

post.description: Request controller to begin a flushing action immediately.  (authorized by users only)
Restore controller's configurations to factory defaults
Restore controller's configurations according to filter type defaults

get.description: Get current flushing status.
Get current flushing status.
Get count of flushing actions.
Get count of flushing actions.

post.description: Reset flush counter.  (authorized by users only)
Reset flush counter.  (authorized by admins only)
Set configurations for controller. Controller parameters will be validated according to firmware specifications (HLD 1.1)

get.description: Get current configurations of controller

post.description: Set global configurations of entire system (super admin only)

get.description: Get global configurations of entire system (super admin only)
Get latest version available for update, for the specific controller.

post.description: Upload version to cloud (Superadmin only)

get.description: get all versions - Allowed for admins only

post.description: Request controller to be updated for a specific version (return immediately)

get.description: get history of flush activations. Either timeSpan or startDate+endDate are required.
get history of flush activations. no offset/limit. If response too large - will fail.
get history for all controllers flush activations. no offset/limit. If response too large - will fail.
get history of alarms
get alarms history for all controllers
get alarms history for all controllers
get summary data of all my controllers
get sequence of aggregated history for analog input. input number can be
get sequence of aggregated history for irrigation water meter.

post.description: Add admin/superadmin user. (authorized for superadmins only)
registration of a user (intended for mobile flow)

get.description: Get info of multiple admin/superadmin users. (authorized for superadmins only)
Get status of user registration request

post.description: VerifyUser registration verification stage
reset password for user - (intended for mobile flow)

get.description: Get status of password reset request

post.description: stage 2 of reset password - verification (path returned in stage 1)
stage 3 of reset password - new password (path returned in stage 2)

get.description: Get info about the current client

put.description: update details of logged in user/admin. managedCountries parameter for admin only.
Modify admin details - authorized exclussively to superadmins

get.description: Get info about a specific user (authorized by admin/superadmin only)

delete.description: Remove admin/superadmin user. (authorized for superadmins only)

post.description: send support request

get.description: Get list of values

post.description: add user to controller's notifications group

delete.description: remove user from controller's notifications group

post.description: add device for user to push notifications for ios/android

delete.description: remove device for user to push notifications for ios/android

offset.name: offset
offset.description: in multi-result responses, specifies which result to send from

limit.name: limit
limit.description: in multi-result responses, specifies how many results to send

requiredLimit.name: limit
requiredLimit.description: in multi-result responses, specifies how many results to send

includeInfo.name: includeInfo
includeInfo.description: if true, status response will contain controllers info

creationDateFrom.name: creationDateFrom
creationDateFrom.description: controller's creation date range (from and to should be specified together)

creationDateTo.name: creationDateTo
creationDateTo.description: controller's creation date range (from and to should be specified together)

controllerAccess.name: controllerAccess
controllerAccess.description: If not defined, owned and shared are filtered by default.

controllerGroup.description: filter controllers within a master/slave hirerchy according to master id.
controllerGroup.name: controllerGroup

v1_offset.name: offset
v1_offset.description: in multi-result responses, specifies which result to send from

v1_limit.name: limit
v1_limit.description: in multi-result responses, specifies how many results to send

v1_requiredLimit.name: limit
v1_requiredLimit.description: in multi-result responses, specifies how many results to send

v1_includeInfo.name: includeInfo
v1_includeInfo.description: if true, status response will contain controllers info

v1_creationDateFrom.name: creationDateFrom
v1_creationDateFrom.description: controller's creation date range (from and to should be specified together)

v1_creationDateTo.name: creationDateTo
v1_creationDateTo.description: controller's creation date range (from and to should be specified together)

v1_controllerAccess.name: controllerAccess
v1_controllerAccess.description: If not defined, owned and shared are filtered by default.

threshold.description: maximum recommended count from last reset to next reset

isExceeded.description: was count from last reset exceeded threshold for next reset.

countAfterReset.description: count from last reset to last flush

CONFIG_ID_FLUSH_METHOD_DP_ENABLE.description: Flush method DP enable - Start flush due to DP sensor readings

CONFIG_ID_FLUSH_METHOD_INTERVAL_ENABLE.description: Flush method interval enable - Start flush due to interval time (from last flush start) reach

CONFIG_ID_FLUSH_METHOD_SCHEDULE_ENABLE.description: Flush method schedule enable - Start flush due to scheduled time reached

CONFIG_ID_ACTION_IN_CONTINUOUS.description: Action in continuous - what to do when continuous happen

CONFIG_ID_AIN1_ENABLED.description: Analog Input 1 - Enable / Disable Analog Input 1 measurement

CONFIG_ID_AIN1_SENSOR.description: AIN1 Sensor Type - What kind of sensors -- > units

CONFIG_ID_AIN1_TYPE.description: AIN1 Input Type - Define the type of Analog input Current/Voltage

CONFIG_ID_AIN2_ENABLED.description: Analog Input 2 - Enable / Disable Analog Input 2 measurement

CONFIG_ID_AIN_SAMPLE_INTERVAL.description: Analog Input Sampling Interval - if not as main system DP

CONFIG_ID_COMM_METHOD.description: Communication Method - Determine the communication method of the controller

CONFIG_ID_DOWN_STREAM_DELAY.description: Downstream Valve Delay - close down stream valve before start flushing

CONFIG_ID_DOWN_STREAM_ENABLE.description: Down Stream Valve Enable/Disable - Down Stream Valve Enable/Disable

CONFIG_ID_DOWN_STREAM_VALVE_ADDRESS.description: Down stream valve address - Master/ RTU N (1-255)

CONFIG_ID_DP_ADDRESS.description: system DP Device address  - Master/ RTU N (1-255)

CONFIG_ID_DP_DELAY.description: DP Delay - When DPS condition is met, check that condition is stable for DPD time, before starting flush.

CONFIG_ID_DP_SET_POINT.description: DP Set point - IF DP is defined in OMC, flush will start if DP>DPS.

CONFIG_ID_DP_STABILIZATION_TIME.description: Ignore DP - Ignore DP after flush (stable time)

CONFIG_ID_DWELL_TIME.description: Dwell Time - Dwell time between 2 filters

CONFIG_ID_END_OF_CYCLE_LENGTH.description: End Of cycle - EOC pulse length

CONFIG_ID_EOC_RELAY_OUTPUT.description: EOC Relay output - Enable/Disable EOC pulse

CONFIG_ID_EXTERNAL_DP_ADDRESS.description: External DP address - Master/ RTU N (1-255)

CONFIG_ID_HIGH_DP_ALARM_THRESHOLD.description: High DP Alarm - Alarm state when DP>HDA: Activate Red LED on panel + log event.

CONFIG_ID_INTERVAL.description: Interval - IF Time is defined in OMC, flush will start if DPI is over.

CONFIG_ID_MAXIMUM_UPSTREAM_PRESSURE.description: Maximum Upstream Pressure - Maximum allowed pressure for the filter operation

CONFIG_ID_MINIMUM_DOWN_STREAM_PRESSURE.description: Minimum Downstream pressure - Minimum pressure for proper flush

CONFIG_ID_MINIMUM_INTERVAL_FOR_CONTINUOU.description: Minimum Interval for continuous  - Minimum time between flushes in continuous mode,

CONFIG_ID_RTU_ADDRESS.description: Mode of operation - 0 for master, 1-255 for slave

CONFIG_ID_NUMBER_OF_CONSECUTIVE_CYCLES.description: Number of Consecutive Cycles - Continuous mode: if after a flush, still DP>DPS, start another flush. NCC is the number of consecutive flushes.

CONFIG_ID_SOLENOID_LENGTH.description: Solenoid pulse length - Set/reset solenoid pulse time.

CONFIG_ID_SYSTEM_UNITS.description: System Units      bar/psi - For application use only?

CONFIG_ID_TOM_ENABLE.description: Skip interval Flush at low DP - Enable / disable for Interval DP threshold

CONFIG_ID_TOM_THRESHOLD.description: Pause if DP is less than - If time interval (DPI) is over and TOM Enable, , flush will start only if DP > TOM.

CONFIG_ID_ALERTS_CLOUD_PUSH.description: list of alert IDs that should cause cloud connection to be triggered

CONFIG_ID_ALERTS_ENTER_ALARM.description: list of alert IDs that should cause alarm state to be triggered

CONFIG_ID_LOW_TEMPERATURE_THRESHOLD.description: temprature reading from pressure sensor unit - celsius, steps - 0.1

CONFIG_ID_WMETER_SAMPLE_INTERVAL.description: interval for flow sampling and log record (if on flush pipe need to measure at flush). Units = seconds, Steps = 60
